name: Adobe Open Source
body:
###  Welcome to Adobe's open source on Github ![Adobe standard logo]( http://adobe.github.com/img/adobe_logo_standard_png.png)

##**New and Noteworthy**:

[**GCView**: ](https://github.com/adobe-research/GCview) a generic and easily adaptable visualization and monitoring framework targeted (but not limited) to memory  management systems (garbage collectors, malloc/free implementations, hardware caches, etc.).  A  system can be visualized by mapping its operation, data structures, heap layout, and other attributes onto GCview abstractions. 

[**Gradientsmap.js**: ](https://github.com/awgreenblatt/gradientmaps) A Javascript library that allows you to easily apply gradient maps to any HTML element on the page.

## **Organizations:**
(Adobe groups that are releasing technology under open source.  There may be multiple projects under each organization)

[**Adobe:** ](https://github.com/adobe) Repository for certain Adobe Open Source releases

[**Adobe Security:** ](https://github.com/adobe-security) Releases from the Adobe Security teams

[**Adobe Research:** ](https://github.com/adobe-research) Releases from the Adobe Research teams

[**Adobe Web Platform:** ](https://github.com/adobe-Webplatform) Releases from the Adobe Web Platform teams

[**Adobe Fonts:** ](https://github.com/adobe-fonts) Releases from the Adobe Font teams

[**Adobe CloudOps:** ](https://github.com/Adobe-CloudOps) Releases from the Adobe Cloud Operations teams

[**Topcoat**: ](https://github.com/topcoat/topcoat) UI Library for creating beautiful and responsive applications using web standards

[**Adobe Flash**: ](https://github.com/adobe-flash) Stuff from the Adobe Flash team

[**Adobe Photoshop**: ](https://github.com/adobe-photoshop) Stuff from the Adobe Photoshop team

## **Popular Projects**:

[**Brackets:** ](https://github.com/adobe/brackets) An open source code editor for the web, written in JavaScript, HTML and CSS

[**Source Sans Pro:** ](https://github.com/adobe/source-sans-pro) OpenType fonts that have been designed to work well in user interface (UI) environments

[**Source Code Pro:** ](https://github.com/adobe/source-code-pro) OpenType fonts that have been designed to work well in code environments

[**CSS Filterlab:** ](https://github.com/adobe/cssfilterlab) Browser-based tool that lets you use and modify CSS filters and see the effects in real time 

[**Spry:** ](https://github.com/adobe/Spry) JavaScript-based framework that enables the rapid development of Ajax-powered web pages

[**Balanced Text:** ](https://github.com/adobe-webplatform/balance-text) jQuery plugin for implementing balancing of wrapping text in a web page

[**Phonegap:** ](http://github.com/phonegap) Web platform that exposes native mobile device apis and data to JavaScript. PhoneGap is a distribution of [Apache Cordova](http://cordova.apache.org/)

[**Edge Inspect JavaScript API**: ](https://github.com/adobe/edge-inspect-api) a simple JavaScript library that will allow other pieces of software to easily integrate with a limited subset of Edge Inspect features. See [also the blog posting. ](http://blogs.adobe.com/edgeinspect/2013/06/18/introducing-the-edge-inspect-javascript-api/)
